articles.title: Credit Suisse Dumps Softbank Over Greensill - finews.com
articles.description: The Swiss bank is reportedly severing its relationship with Japanese conglomerate Softbank, following blow-up of $10.1 billion in supply chain funds managed with Greensill.
articles.content:
The Swiss bank is reportedly severing its relationship with Japanese conglomerate Softbank, following blow-up of $10.1 billion in supply chain funds managed with Greensill.
